about_the_game:
Pixel medieval art style, emphasizing leisure and entertainment

Pixel Knight, Pixel Orc, Pixel Landscape, make people feel relaxed and happy, even if you lose, you won't feel sad.

The situation of the war is ever-changing, unleash your intelligence and wit

In the game, each type of army has its own characteristics, requiring you to use your intelligence, arrange troops reasonably, and avoid being "stolen" by enemies.

Have fun with friends

After opening the game room, invite your friends to join the game in the chat window and organize a big fight between your "little people" and the other party's "little people".

The game is still in the development stage, and more content will be released in the future. Thank you to every friend for their attention and support.

name: Mini Kingdom Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: English is a medieval strategy war game where you can freely choose your faction, acquire resources, purchase armies from crystals, strengthen yourself, defeat enemy armies, break down enemy walls, and destroy enemy crystals to win the game. You can compete with AI and invite friends to play online.
